website_summaries.verdict: While this model may be too comprehensive for basic manicures, it's worth considering for acrylic nails.
pros: Great for acrylic nails, thanks to the variable speed control that can reach up to 30,000 RPM
Can be controlled by hand or with the included foot pedal
Comes with 6 stainless steel drill bits
cons: Some owners express longevity concerns, as a few units quit working unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to use it as soon as it came thru that door absolutley loved it👌👌
customer_reviews.author: maria rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great.
customer_reviews.text: This little electric drill is surprisingly great. I recently started doing my own nails after watching some YouTube videos on PolyGel nails and trying with regular files. Not kind on the cuticles. So I ordered this wondering if it'd be strong enough to work well. Like with pressure would the motor be strong enough to keep spinning. So far it's gone like a champ. It's so easy to get up right along the cuticle for a nice smooth start to the nail. It comes with a little pack of different drill file bits, including a small pointy one for filing under the nails which I love. Also, a baggie of sandpaper files.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat this quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this drill! The style is unique and not like your typical nail drill. The color is beautiful and hand piece is just the right size for my hand. The foot petal is a plus so that it’s not awkward to stop and start the drill. No vibration or skipping on the nail
customer_reviews.author: Delissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this drill once to fix 1 nail (gel enhancement). I liked the units looks and feel, the foot pedal didn't work though. No biggie.. I normally don't use the foot pedal. I went to do a fill today and the unit it's dead. The light turns on, so there's power going to the unit, but it doesn't spin forward, reverse, low, or high speed. Dead.. completely dead after using the unit for a total of 5 min a few days ago. I'm so sick of GARBAGE that ends up at the dump.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Cue

customer_reviews.title: Worse item ever
customer_reviews.text: Worse thing I have ever purchased. I never write reviews but this item called for one. I tested the drill the first day it arrived, put it away as I was waiting for the right time to use it. I finally set time aside to learn how to use my poly gel kit. When I went to turn on the drill it doesn’t work. Are you kidding me??! This item wasn’t even used for more than 5 minutes and is dead. Wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: GOT RICE

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this acrylic drill. It arrived perfectly packed and on time. It's a heavy efile. Not so heavy it's obnoxious, but quality heavy. It won't pull off the table when you move. The file itself is weighted nicely that the low vibration it does put out is balanced nicely in your hand. There is so much less feed back from the file when in contact with the acrylic. The bits actually locked down into the efile creating a lot less danger than other files that you just shove it in there. The foot peddler is perfect and I feel a safety spec. This file is an investment in a higher quality nail game.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Hinshalwood

customer_reviews.title: Such A Waste
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited when I received my efile drill however, my excited was not long lasting. This drill only lasted 20 minutes if that. After removing gel polish and completing a clients filling I needed it to smooth the nail bed. Well forget it!!! It stopped working, the power would not come on I unplugged it several times and even tested in different sockets. Highly Disappointed!! DO NOT BUY WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: Weird Sound at the Handle of the Drill
customer_reviews.text: Dear Seller, the product arrived very quickly in my country and was delivered as a birthday present on July 15 of this year. However, the drill has only been used about 5 times and already has problems. It makes a weird sound in the handle of the drill, as you can see and hear in the video. I am not satisfied with the product at all and I would like to know about the money back or send me a new handle to be a replacement since it is so dangerous for the people who handle it or dangerous for the nails or fingers of the people being treated by the drill.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!!!
customer_reviews.text: My disabled dad has really thick/hard toenails and fingernails. Takes forever file down and too thick to clip without hurting him. Taking him to the doctor to get clip would often leave him in pain, sometimes a toenail would even bleed!!!! This drill gets the job done and quickly. He was so comfortable he fell asleep love it!! Love how the speeds can adjust to the perfect seeing for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kalhoun S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this July 14th..... died as of today October 4th and I wasn't even using it like that for this to even stop working outta nowhere. Basically in 3 months this don't work anymore. The light is on so I know it's nothing wrong with my sockets which means after 3 months the motor goes out. This is very disappointing because this was a great drill before it stopped working on me and I was in the middle of doing my nails on top of that. Glad i didn't have any clients because this woulda been embarrassing. Can't return it and don't know who I can contact to get it replaced so I guess I just lost $60 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Tszaddi Josaiah

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I purchased this drill on June 3rd, 2020 and here it is the drill stopped working while I was in the middle of practicing a set on September 16Th. Barely 3mnths and it just stopped working out of no where. The email warranty requested a video proving the drill no longer works and then they would send me another drill in 10-12 days. I would prefer a refund and just buy another drill since I had appointments for hand models scheduled the next week. Save yourself the time and money by getting another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Changed Review
customer_reviews.text: I've waited a week to post a comment as I've been busy paying attention to the drill while working on my clients. Its very cute and appealing to the eye on my desk. Its quiet and very easy to use. Im used to turning the knob instead of the foot pedal, however I plan to use it more often and adapt to that. There aren't any major concerns at this time and I will update if anything changes. This is a great purchase for beginners as you can control the speed at the lowest setting and the higher setting is not crazy. ************ Updated 7/10/2020 There was a shortage in the cord already. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fantasya tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stylish look of my new drill. The color is beautiful. Although this beauty may look to be heavy but is very lightweight. I recommend this drill for anyone whether you've been doing nails a long time or maybe just starting. This this the best drill for the buck. I love the fact that it actually has placements for my drill bits, and my headpiece. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Willetta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and performance.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs I'm not a nail tech, but I have been doing my own nails for more than 30 years and this machine is good, fast and so easy to use. I purchased Makartt Tungsten Carbide Nail Drill Bits Set 7Pcs to Remove Acrylic Nail Polish Poly Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel B-08 to use them with the machine. I can say 4 - 6 hours of acrylic work was reduced to 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joeli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all uses!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this machine for almost everything. I love doing my nails a lot and it’s great for helping me remove gel when I don’t feel like soaking my fingers in skin damaging acetone. It’s easy to control what speed you want with the knob and the foot pedal lets you start or stop anytime you want. The kit also comes with several different heads as well as disposable ones to use on other people. Another unconventional use for this machine that I really love it for is crafting. I love using it for smoothing down edges on resin pieces for jewelry. It’s also great for shaping down to the shape I want smoothly and without and jagged edges.
customer_reviews.author: mindy chiang

customer_reviews.title: Get it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great buy. So worth the money for beginners. Anyone who is saying the drill isn’t strong enough clearly doesn’t understand how to use the dial to make the drill go faster. Definitely recommend and highly recommend you to not listen to the bad reviews. I know the bad reviews can steer you away to another product but the price you’re paying, i literally have not one complaint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth running
customer_reviews.text: I Love this drill, its quiet smooth running the only thing is sometimes when I step on the foot peddle there is a hesitation I don't know if it's me or the drill. I've only done one set of nails with it but I do like it other than that one issue. If I figure it out I'll do another review to clarify.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great drill!
customer_reviews.text: I had been going back and forth about 4 different drills for a whole month lol... I'm glad I chose this one! I got the gold one and it's so chic... It's not loud, it's steady easy to hold and use. I'm very happy with my purchase. I've been doing my own nails since March. It was time for me to get a good drill. I just hope it last and doesn't burn out in a month or something crazy. So far so good. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: beautyallN1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this drill!!!!!This is a very good drill. It came with a foot pedal that you DONT have to use. This drill has become my favorite drill out of my other 3. I love the placement for my bits very It becomes very helpful because I misplace them a lot. Overall it’s an amazing drill.❤️
customer_reviews.author: rakeeliah

customer_reviews.title: Great e-file with only one downside!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and weight of this e-file. The handpiece is not too bulky, easy to manipulate. Like that it has a place for the bits. Its also a low vibration e-file which is excellent. This is definitely one of the best budget e-files I have used. The only downside of this machine is that, while it has a foot pedal, it is poor quality and can only control on and off feature does not titrate speed like other e-files I have used. Thats why I only gave it 4 stars. It would be great for someone who doesn't use the foot pedal. Overall pleased with the stunning sleek design and great control you get with this e-file.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Villatoro

customer_reviews.title: great product. Worth the price. Professional product but great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am by far not a professional manicurist. The ease of use is incredible. Its so very quiet. I do my own manicure/pedicure and it looks so very profession. Will not pay to have those services done now that I can do a better job at home. Continued use is recommended to get better at using ie: speed, tools, accuracy with non dominant hand. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: This drill is great
customer_reviews.text: This drill is the perfect drill ...it’s lightweight..easy to use ...comes with extra sanding bands & more drill bit ..what else can you ask for ?????? ..it great for beginners and more experienced ppl ....if you haven’t yet get this drill ....It’s affordable & so worth it ... the shipping was Fast and it was packaged good ... if you’re looking for a drill to start of with or just looking for a great quality drill this is the drill for you 🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Godi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners, buy other bits if you're looking to work on extensions!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Got a bunch of crap to do nails at home, this works for natural nails, gel polish removal, and even polygel removal. I'm sure it would work on acrylics also. I did purchase ceramic bits also since these bits are mediocre aside from the mandrel/sanding bands.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Happy. So far so perfect 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: I just received my drill this morning. When I opened the box I thought they forgot to include the hand drill?!?! I was upset at first. Through all that excitement I didn’t realize the hand drill is between the motor and a cardboard section within the box. Lollll. Anyway I am amped and excited. The drill is not noisy at all. The speed is spectacular. I can’t wait until all my other supplies come in so I can start doing my own nails now. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Brit Da Brat

customer_reviews.title: DEPENDABLE
customer_reviews.text: I love all the features of an e file and this is a good one. I don't like the big box it is housed in, it's inconvenient to store and to find a place to set up in a small area.The ease with which to change the bit is fabulous. I have had no problems with this unit. I would like to see an additional drill available for backup.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine until it stopped working. It skips. Sometimes it works and then it just stops. On n off on n off while I’m with clients. Nothing is wrong with the outlets nor the socket as it works for other items. Very disappointed. Cant return bc its after the 13th. Its only been a month. Never dropped it wet it nothing. It sits on a desk
customer_reviews.author: Ashanee

customer_reviews.title: nail file
customer_reviews.text: This item has already stop working and as of 7/14/20 I cannot return so I guess not a good item to spend your money on. I cannot call anyone to see about a replacment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine was damaged?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because i thought the foot pedal was a cool feature. Andddd it doesnt work. The drill works fine manually but it does suck $70 later the foot pedal doesnt work....
customer_reviews.author: Keana

customer_reviews.title: Best nail drill for the money and beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew I needed a foot pedal?! It comes in handy! Highly recommend. The power is there and the ease of use is clutter-free on my nail desk. It’s important to get a nail drill with at least 30000 rpm and I made the mistake of not doing that with my first drill. This nail drill has all that and more for such a budget friendly price! Must buy
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ugghhhh!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Am I the only one who has a very bad shortage in my drill ... it’s so annoying trying to do nails and have to keep repositioning the cord every 5 seconds .... it’s been doing this since I unpackaged it 😥
customer_reviews.author: Tomekia

customer_reviews.title: Good for regular use
customer_reviews.text: Quality and cute on my nail station. I use this daily and fits all my current bits. Very low vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this nail drill and many reasons why I love it. When you want to attach the nail drill bits, it is easy to lock and unlock the nail bits to make sure it’s secure. I thought it would be hard to use the foot pedal but it’s actually easy to control. I love how the control box has a space to put out your nail drill bits. It is good quality and would recommend it to anyone from beginners to professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Susana G.

customer_reviews.title: JUST LIKE THE ONE IN THE PROFESSIONAL,SALON
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD PRODUCT JUST LIKE THE ONE IN THE PROFESSIONAL NAIL SALON, I HAVE VERY THICK ACRYLIC NAIL LONG ALSO BUT THIS MACHINE ABLE TO FILE DOWN FOR ME NICE AND SOOTH VERY GOOD PRODUCT POWERFUL BUT NOT LOUD EASY TO USE. GREAT PRICE ALSO ARRIVED FAST, EVEN THIS CORONA-19 Pandemic time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy and powerful it is . It's such good quality. Ive had this drill for about a year now and I can honestly say it's better then the expensive brands I've bought the $200 e-file and it isn't no where near as good as this one I totally recommend this one . I love that it come with the foot pedal option too
customer_reviews.author: NinaRamos

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working entirely after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I really liked this drill for the price and quality, but after two months the reverse function stopped working. Then, a week later, it stopped working entirely. I tried to find the email for the company but didn’t have any luck. Only an international call number (and I personally don’t like handling customer service issues over the phone).
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S Repper

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼 ✰ ☆ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ✰ ☆👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done nails for over 20 years & I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this drill. Cord on drill doesn’t stay in good but everything else is good👍🏼 I would definitely recommend this drill especially for the price ✰ ☆ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ✰ ☆ It would be good for a beginner nail tech or a experienced tech👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It’s CUTE and it’s GOLD! And it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been researching and comparing different nail drills and was going to by the markatt nail drill but I suddenly saw this one, which, I haven’t seen before so it must be new? Anyway, the sleek design and color caught my attention and with the good reviews I didn’t hesitate to buy it. It had everything I was looking for: small, lightweight, not noisy, foot pedal, small hand tool, rest area for hand tool and bits, and the rpm settings were low/high enough. Someone else stated that it does not stall or stop and I can attest to that! I love it and am so happy I purchased it. You will not be disappointed! It’s cute and it’s gold!
customer_reviews.author: myang23

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little machine!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could use one of these! I was wrong! Super easy even on my right hand. Love the pedal to turn on and off. Easy to switch between attachments slow speed for natural nails makes my manicures a breeze!! Love this!! Doesn’t skip on your nail either which I was a little nervous of.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: this nail drill is exceptionally easy for beginners to pick up! i've only used it once, but that was enough to get the feel of how it functions. it's VERY powerful and definitely matches salon quality. if you're looking for a drill, spend the extra 20$ and get this one instead of the single hand-held units!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: I used the nail drill one time about 10 minutes and it randomly stopped and cut off! The price I paid for this is unacceptable!!! Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I received my package a day earlier than expected ! My previous drill gave me so much trouble so i decided to order this one after many great reviews. i am not disappointed! light, has a head lock and not loud at all which is perfect with a sleeping baby at home! thank you!!! update: i was very pleased but not even a month in and the hand device stopped working completely during a set. Customer Service is great but now i have to wait 2 weeks or more to replace the defective part. Not Happy. i am currently doing nails and this caused a major set back. Would i purchase again? No.
customer_reviews.author: AGJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I got this drill in August and only used it 4 times and it already doesn’t work it’s a shortage in the wire.I’m so pissed cause now I have to buy a new drill. Can’t return it cause it’s been over 30 days but this drill definitely should of worked longer than two month and after 4 uses
customer_reviews.author: KoKo Kisses

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Giving item a 3 until I hear from who I have gifted it too I’ll update further...as for the packaging everything intact n looks great And shipping was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and professional results
customer_reviews.text: I used it as soon as it was delivered (I had to wait a while due to Covid) SO worth the wait! I only purchased this really because I just needed to do Something/anything with my nail because they were looking horrendous. But now that I’ve purchased dipping powder and THIS DRILL I am overwhelmed at how professional my first time came out I don’t foresee myself that frequent in the nail salon anymore. I just would like the see how well it’ll hold up over time (comes with 12 month warrantee) it’s also tinier than I anticipated which I really liked. HIGHLY recommend <3
customer_reviews.author: Elise Euphoria

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: Yesss! This is such a perfect nail drill. I previously had one from wish that was annoyingly loud and vibrates so bad and to go from that to this is heavenly! I’m a beginner so I don’t know much but I do know this is a great nail drill ! Most importantly no vibration!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for professionals and beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this nail drill! I just started doing my own acrylic nails and was worried about using a drill on myself, but this drill is absolutely amazing! Easy to use! It has a peddle to run it or you can run it yourself. It’s made my nails look like a professional did it!!! If you are looking for a reasonable nail drill, this is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: Anjanae Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: this is my second nail drill. I wanted a much better one my older drill the drill bits kept falling out. This one is perfect, it holds my drill bits in place and has diff speed settings. It’s quiet. Just a great nail drill. would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Works great until it decides to die a couple weeks after you get it.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great... until it didn’t. It just stopped working one day. The red light come on but something with the motor. I contacted the company, they said they’d send me a new hand drill to plug and I never received it. Only had it since March so bummer that it broke after 5 months!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. The bits that come with the machine are not good so I bought my own (recommend ceramic). Overall, works quietly, goes fast, slow, left, right, however you want it. I’m not a professional, but for me this is a good product for this amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Valeriia Shadrina

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This actually is a great drill. It has a lot of power, but be careful not to use it or leave it on too long at a time or it heats up. Not sure how long it would last if you constantly use it every day but I use it probably a few times a week, and it's great. You cannot feel the vibration as much, and it doesn't make your hand uncomfortable from the vibration. for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jalissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this nail drill. I have a smaller one that is ok, but this one is awesome. In my opinion the best part about this drill is being able to control the speed better. I also like the fact that you can control the drill using a foot pedal.
customer_reviews.author: BabiiGirl

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This efile worked great for the first month or so and then it starting cutting out. Other reviewers said the same thing. You constantly have to reposition the cord and it forces you to hold it an an odd angle. This may not be the most expensive file but it sure wasn’t dirt cheap. Spend a little more and get a good file!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garabedian

customer_reviews.title: Buy it gurl, this drill will help you save a few coins... You can do you nails yourself. 😝
customer_reviews.text: Go ahead buy it... This was my first time doing my own nails, and when I tell you people are surprised when I tell them that I did not go to a salon. I attached a picture of my nails after using this drill. 💅
customer_reviews.author: Marretta Louise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing drill. I love it. I used as soon as I received it and it is wayyyyy better than my first drill. I seen a lot of people have bad experiences with it but so far so good I used it on my boyfriend nails and it filed it down super quick and well. Only thing I noticed was that the door pedal lagged a bit but I’m not sure if all drills with a pedal are like that. I love the foot pedal feature, made it super easy to stop and go. That was my biggest pet peeve with my other drill comes with 12 month warranty. This drill is worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marizela amaral

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: After only 10 uses, the motor will no longer supply power to the hand drill, thus rendering the product useless. Super disappointed because the company has not responded to my request for help to correct this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica N.

customer_reviews.title: Great drill and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVEE this drill! But I will say that the hand piece started having problems about 4 months after I bought it. I would have to hold the cord a certain way for it to work. But I messaged the seller and YOUR WARRANTY LASTS 6 months! They sent me a new hand piece free of charge and everything is all good now! Great customer service!!! If you have a problem just message them!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, only used once. I didnt have to go above 5000rpm for taking off gel polish or shaping product. Seems real powerful I havent even made it go up higher on rpm. I havent tried the foot pedal either.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mart

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for acrylic nails
customer_reviews.text: I'm for certain my item is defective, it heats up badly and for sure does not work on the acrylic nails I've tried using 3 times on a lower setting because I'm afraid it'll mess up even worse. The sand band is the only thing that does well on a natural nail but even still it heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Latrice

customer_reviews.title: NoNoNo
customer_reviews.text: I liked it when I first got it, now it still works but it stops sometimes for no reason and it gets really really really hot to the point you can’t hold it in your hands. Just realized it say they closed the return window If the seller can write me I would appreciate it because I want to do a return or swap out fur a new one. Not sure why it stops in between and why it gets really really hot. I have not had it that long nor used it that much
customer_reviews.author: Johnae Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a professional!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely live this product it has made my work so much easier and efficient! I love that it stands on my desk and I don’t have to bother with cords all over the place, it’s sturdy and powerful! Only thing I would change is the on n off button to be on the right side and the forward and reverse switch to be on the left side. And another thing if you have a lead foot do not use the peddle it comes with it lol it works just fine without
customer_reviews.author: RA Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke within 5 months of having it kept everything emailed them for my warranty haven’t gotten any response back I’m supper disappointed I loved it while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: jaysa snyder

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt even work and bits dont fit.
customer_reviews.text: Went to use my e and not of the bits fit they are all loose and it wont even start. Spent 70 dollars on this and it doesnt work waste of cash.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: As a professional nail tech, I’ve used mostly high end electric nail files and they didn’t last as long as anticipated, considering the cost. So when I say I thoroughly impressed with this drill, I mean it!! It has an elite look! The rpm is great. I didn’t have to turn it up to but about a fourth of the capacity it operates at. The hand piece is lightweight and there is no vibration even at the highest rpm. As a beginner or a pro, you’ll love this drill. I’d highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Commonique

customer_reviews.title: Power, durability, and style !
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with the drill! Best bang for you Buck I havnt experienced over heating or anything like that. It's super cute! I love it. I've had it for over a month now and it's all together great.
customer_reviews.author: Anahi Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I chose this drill. It’s light, quiet and comfortable in both hands. It doesn’t get hot as you use it. The reverse really does help when using your non dominant hand. The veritable speed is awesome! I can go slow around my cuticles and medium speed for the body of the nail. Signing up for the 12 month warranty was very easy. The money is very worth the product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Livengood

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This drill is amazing!!! I had a practice hand and tried to remove acrylics from to practice more and the drill I had took FOREVER! This one however took me 10 MINUTES to drill off 3 acrylics completely highly recommend!! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic nail drill!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this nail drill! Super easy to use, especially if you are a beginner like I was! I love that it has the different speed settings, that it is super quiet and still very powerful! A must have for anyone who does their own nails!
customer_reviews.author: kategurl87

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 highly recommend! Great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! I am new to the nail world because I've always been too hard on nail polish with my jobs. I recently started using dip powder and decided one of these would make my life and the process a whooooole lot easier. I am SO glad I did. I've only used it twice so far, but it's easy, has plenty of power, and came with all the necessary tools. I highly suggest it. OH it's really quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this nail file! Works amazing for filing off poly gel/acrylic. Would definitely!! Also comes with a year warranty which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Product came early. Packaged very well. The design is awesome I have a small table and have dropped my other hand piece several times because no where to put it. Power is amazing even at the lowest lowest speed. I gave four starts for beginners because of the power; if they do not know how to angle or apply pressure correctly it can do damage quick. I haven’t used it will soon and do a video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool for a few uses I guess...
customer_reviews.text: Well my new drill vibrated and just cut off. The powers still on but no drill no nothin. They said contact them yet I don’t have a way to contact them...soooo I’m out of a drill after less than 10 uses. Cool.
customer_reviews.author: Melanin Goddess ❤️

customer_reviews.title: I love my new drill!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my drill and I am in love. This drill looks very luxurious and the color is really nice. The drill is super quiet and I liked that the Handle is thinner from the bottom compared to my past drills. Overall I am in love because my favorite part is you can put your favorite drillbits there and they will be handy all the time. Overall Im really Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: Great for professional use or beginner
customer_reviews.text: This drill is the first i have used and i am a beginner with this whole nail thing. As you can see from the picture, this drill is amazing!! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: DANA PETTY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the product, pleased with the customer service
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a great drill for the 1st 30min of using it, then it would randomly turn on while it was sitting in the cradle, client's thought it was possessed. I asked for a replacement, they were very quick to get my replacement to me. Started using the 2nd one and the foot pedal that I rely on quit working in the middle of a client after 2 days. I'm done! Moving on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa George

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice, quiet and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: The foot pedal is optional but still really cool! The machine is so quiet it's like filing butter! The only thing I don't like about it is I thought when I ordered it that it came with one of the round drill bits made for cuticles and it wouldn't be a problem to order some I just don't want them to not fit the drill. The file is great and comes with a 12 month warranty!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill
customer_reviews.text: I have been a nail tech for 10yrs and has purchased very expensive drills. I have to say that this drill has been the best one yet. U get more than your moneys worth. Light weight, powerful,little to no vibration, and a space saver.
customer_reviews.author: NailDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners or pros.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nail drill tool kit I’ve owned. I was really shocked at the power and the range from slow to what seems like super sonic. It comes with many drill tips and buffers or what some people call sanders. Also it’s super cute and looks good sitting on the table. It has slots on the top for drill bits for easy access. I think this is a very good product at a good price. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie R.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't make through a whole set of nails...
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting on getting my license reinstated. I was so excited to be making some extra money. Covid has messed up everything...It started out fine. I started on the next hand and it just stopped. I checked it over and over....It would not come on. After the hand model left about an hour later I tried again. It comes on and stops again. Very disappointing. $60.00 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: R. Denise Foster

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and cute !
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the drill. The little holes at the back for for the bits, I thought that was a lovely touch. Super easy to use. And it looks nice on my nail table.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Powerful drill at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This drill works great! I do my own dip nails at home and this drill works just as well as the drills in the salons I’ve been to. The foot pedal is convenient. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Lightweight and strong motor. Broken foot pedal.
customer_reviews.text: The drill is very nice and has a strong motor. It is very quiet and lightweight. The only issue is that the foot pedal was broken. It did not work and it sounds like something is rattling inside. With this Coronavirus going on I dont want to ship it back. I don't know if I can just get a new pedal shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Davis

customer_reviews.title: Drill
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this drill for about a month now on my clients and I absolutely love it. I love that it has little holes On top to hold the bits that you mainly use! 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nails by les

customer_reviews.title: died after 7 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drill 7 weeks and already had stopped working! Like the cord cuts off. It won't spin. Update: since I couldn't return this item and after writing this review I was automatically sent a replacement! Just the motor (which seemed like the only problem) but yay! Let's try this again. Thank you to the vendor for taking the initiative of Just sending it to me without me asking. Now that's customer service 💫💫💫💫
customer_reviews.author: Annel Pineyra

customer_reviews.title: GETS EXTREMELY HOT
customer_reviews.text: This drill handle gets extremely hot while you are filing nails, and while resting gets even hotter, so hot you can not hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: STOPPED WORKING AFTER ONLY A FEW MONTHS MAYBE 5 months. I’m very upset it randomly stopped turning on. My boyfriend tried looking at it and messing with wires and nothing. He’s tech savvy and said it’s just done. No repairing it... as a professional nail technician this was very big disappointment causing me issues with my clientele. I’ve never had a nail drill that reminded me of a cheap TOY
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’m in the nail shop. This tool gives me the power and ability to do my own nails with ease. Easy to use, easy to hold and it has the right amount of power. Smart purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working !! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner home based nail tech. Purchased a opbanie drill (which still works) but wanted to upgrade from the $25 drill so I bought this product July 16th, it’s September 12th and the product has completely stopped working. Save your money and purchase a drill from melody susie ! Great for beginners but the longevity compared to the price of the product isn’t worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted barely 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: This drill barely lasted me 2 months and then stopped working. What a waste of money! I dont even use it everyday! I would like my money back or a replacement sent back!! CUSTOMER SERVICE where are you?
customer_reviews.author: Robin Stultz

customer_reviews.title: Only used for pedicure to far
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible calluses and it worked great for those. Haven't tried on nails yet
customer_reviews.author: Susan G Boveda

customer_reviews.title: Very good nail drill
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed with this nail drill. It is compact and very powerful. The drill goes from 0 to 30,000 with the touch of the dial. It came with a foot pedal which is great. The drill can go from right to left for left hand people as well which is great. I highly recommend this drill.
customer_reviews.author: Sonias

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very quite, and doesn't shake when using. The hand piece is very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review.....Quality Drill but...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I cannot adjust the speed on the drill and therefore am deducting 2 stars. Additionally, after 2 months of use, it stopped working. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill. I got it as a back up drill for my original drill and I was a little skeptical about how it would work but my goodness this drill has exceeded my expectations. I love how light weight this drill is and I can not wait to use it for a full set. This is perfect for beginners and professional nail techs.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Arko Mensah

customer_reviews.title: I feel professional
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Didn't realize how professional and strong this little machine is. Cuts my filing time down more than half
customer_reviews.author: Fortress

customer_reviews.title: Only for natural nails.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, this thing is useless if you use it on gel or acrylic it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best Drill
customer_reviews.text: This drill is great. Used it to file on my practice fingers. They were smooth and even. I would definitely buy this again. My new go to drill!! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Good drill
customer_reviews.text: I like this drill, very light weight and easy to use. It would be great for a beginner. No vibration or loud noise. I also give an extra hooray for the bag of drill that they send with the product. It comes with a foot pedal also. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery to Sweden. Only took like 2 days. Its super pretty and the weight is not bad at all. I have mot been able to try it out yet unfortunately because the outlet is not what ee use here in sweden so I would have to get somethong to be able to plug it in. I didn't see this information when I purchased the file so thats a little sad. But not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Wassmuth

customer_reviews.title: Nice small size and works great!!!!🥰🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect nail drill for DIY at home nails! It’s small and compact to sit on my manicure table and does not take up a lot of space so I still have a lot of room to work on my dip powder nails. My clients will love this.♥️❤️♥️❤️♥️
customer_reviews.author: MochaT

customer_reviews.title: Speed Reader. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s super nice compared to the one I bought a few months ago. That one started doing some funky things and quit working or would work on occasion, the speed was also messed up. But just got this drill today and took it out the box and tried it. This is a very nice drill
customer_reviews.author: Jamal Gant

product_meta.title: Nail Drill for Acrylic Nails - Professional Nail Drill Machine BTArtbox 30000 rpm Electric Efile Nail Drill for Gel Nails Remove Poly Nail Gel Gift for Women Home and Salon Use, Gold
feature_bullets: Meet Normal Multi Uses: This nail drills is powerful and smooth enough for natural acrylics nails, gel polish dip powder nails as well as removal cuticle dead skin, calluses. Professional for both home and salon use, for carving, engraving, routing, grinding, sharpening, sanding, cutting, polishing, drilling, and perfect for pet nail sanding.

Upgraded Handpiece: This nail drill hand piece with high precision & high torque, truly achieve low noise low vibration and low heat. Design with ventilation for reducing the hand piece temperature. Smooth operation with variable speed control (3,000-30,000 RPM ). Meet your multiple manicures from a simple trim to remove gel nails, acrylic nails or poly nail gel.

Foot Pedal and Two Rotation Direction: “Hand” mode and “Foot” mode for you to choose and better meet your requirement. This electric nail drill is equipped with the F-Forward and R-Reverse buttons to change the direction of the rotating bit, which enables any right-handed or left-handed use.

Fashionable & Space-saving Design: BTArtbox nail drill machine comes with a small compact controller and you can place the handpiece in the center of the drill machine.Much saving space on your manicure desk.there are bit holders on the drill machine so you can have drill bits you need right there for your convenience before starting your nail job work.

100% Customer-Happy: BTArtbox Acrylic Nail Drill has approved the RoHS MSDS CE Certificate and with good quality UL adapter. Give you a safe and the best manicure experience. No question ask! If you don't like this professional nail drill for any reason, you can just contact us, we will try our best to fix your problem.
